attributes.comment:
Employment based legal immigrants, like me, have been waiting for years to get
our Green Cards, paying more dollars year after year.

Please remember, EB immigration is married to the job. That means, no
promotion, no substantial increase in salary, no change of jobs for better career
prospects. Imagine this for over six year or more. Trying to balance the family
budget and paying more and more fees for "immigration benefits," is a taxing
financially and mentally.

With Visa dates for adjustments of status set to retrogression for people born in
India, the proposed fees will effectively be a big financial burden .

I STRONGLY OPPOSE this fee increase.
attributes.title: Comment Submitted By Achuta Rao Iruku
